# Curitibanos-SC

```{r, include=FALSE}
source("api_inmet.R")
data_ini <- (now() %>% date() - days(30)) %>% as.character()
data_fim <- (now() %>% date() )%>% as.character()
station <- "A860" # Curitibanos-SC
alt = 978.10
lat = -27.288624

cbs <- get_inmet(data_ini, data_fim, station, alt, lat)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
gt::gt(cbs) %>%
  gt::fmt_number(columns = 2:last_col(), decimals = 1)

```
